    List of templates

    Lorena Pantano

    list_of_templates.Rmd

    R scripts at rmarkdown/Rscripts

    fn category description
    IRFinder_workflow.md intron_retention Not given.
    IRFinder.md intron_retention Methods for IRFinder
    clustering_seurat_subset.R singlecell single cell subset clustering with seurat
    clustering_seurat.R singlecell single cell clustering with seurat
    de_with_zinbwave.R singlecell Rscript DE_across_condition_in_clusters.R cluster_n
    from_bcb_to_seurat.R singlecell convert bcbio object to seurat
    markers_seurat.R singlecell single cell find markers with seurat

    You can get any of this doing:

    source = file.path(system.file("rmarkdown", package="hbcABC"),
          "Rscripts",
          category,
          fn)

file.copy(source, final_R)

    R markdown files rmarkdown/templates

    name description fn
    Differential Expression Template for differential gene expression analysis. It supports multiple contrasts and include gene expression profile detection with degPattern. complex_differential_expression
    Transcript differential Expression Template for differential transcript expression analysis. differential_expression_sleuth
    Legacy Differential Expression Template for differential gene expression analysis. It supports multiple contrasts and include gene expression profile detection with degPattern. legacy_fastrna_differential_expression
    Single Cell Seurat Clustering Analysis Template for scRNAseq to perform seurat clustering with pre-computed data. seurat_clustering_single_cell
    Simple QC Single Cell RNA-seq Template for RNAseq QC with simpler figures. Good for very quick view of the data. simple_qc_rnaseq
    Simple QC Single Cell RNA-seq Template for scRNAseq QC with simpler figures. Good for very quick view of the data. simple_qc_single_cell

    You can get any of this doing:

    source = file.path(system.file("rmarkdown", package="hbcABC"),
          "templates",
          fn,
          "skeleton",
          "skeleton.Rmd")

file.copy(source, final_Rmd)
